scripts.build: echo "Checking for errors ..." && tsc --noEmit && echo "Deleting old data ..." && rm -rf build && echo "Compiling scripts ..." && tsc -b
scripts.build:go: echo "Checking for errors ..." && tsgo --noEmit && echo "Deleting old data ..." && rm -rf build && echo "Compiling scripts ..." && tsgo -b
